question: Bharat e Market' is the e-commerce portal launched by which body?
explanation:
Confederation of All India Traders (CAIT), the apex tradersâ€™ body launched a mobile application, to onboard vendors for its upcoming e-commerce portal 'Bharat e Market'.
The application will enable businesses and service providers to register on the portal and create their own virtual shop or e-dukaan. There will be no commission charged for creating their own shop.
